verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: went] [ARG4: inside the nyc napping lounge where people are paying up to 250 a month to nap in dark private pods at any time of day at nap york in new york city people can pay 15 to nap in a pod for 30 minutes or 250 a month for a nap - a - day membership] we took a look inside the space that aims to be an oasis in the city for busy new yorkers to recharge new york city time nap 250 nyc nap york
